trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for components that provide design-time support in a designer host for Web server controls that are derived from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Ofrece una clase base para los componentes que proporcionan compatibilidad en tiempo de diseño en un host del diseñador para controles de servidor web que se derivan de la clase <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList" />.

trans-unit.source: In a designer host, when the user switches from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> abstract class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: En un host del diseñador, cuando el usuario cambia de origen a la vista de diseño, el código fuente de marcado que describe un control derivado de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> clase abstracta se analiza y se crea una versión en tiempo de diseño del control en la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: When the user switches back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Cuando el usuario vuelve a cambiar a la vista código fuente, el control de tiempo de diseño se mantiene en el código fuente de marcado y editar en el marcado de la página Web.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> abstract class serves as a base class for components that provide design-time support for controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> in a designer host.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> clase abstracta que actúa como clase base para los componentes que proporcionan compatibilidad en tiempo de diseño para los controles que se derivan de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> en un host del diseñador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> class properties provide the following functionality:
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> propiedades de la clase proporcionan la funcionalidad siguiente:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property returns a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.ActionLists%2A> propiedad devuelve un <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> objeto, que normalmente contiene un objeto que se deriva de la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> clase para cada nivel del árbol de herencia del diseñador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataKeyField%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> properties provide access to the corresponding properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataKeyField%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A>, y <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> propiedades proporcionan acceso a las propiedades correspondientes del control asociado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceDesigner%2A> property provides access to the designer of the data source of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceDesigner%2A> propiedad proporciona acceso al diseñador del origen de datos del control asociado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DesignerView%2A> property gets the default view of the data source.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DesignerView%2A> propiedad obtiene la vista predeterminada del origen de datos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> class methods provide the following functionality:
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> métodos de la clase proporcionan la funcionalidad siguiente:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A> método prepara el diseñador para ver, modificar y diseñar el control asociado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.InvokePropertyBuilder%2A> method invokes a component editor for the control.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.InvokePropertyBuilder%2A> método invoca un editor de componentes para el control.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> method is used to add, remove, or shadow design-time properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> método se utiliza para agregar, quitar o sombrear propiedades en tiempo de diseño del control asociado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A> method generates an object that can be used as a data source at design time.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A> método genera un objeto que puede usarse como origen de datos en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method gets the data source from the container of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> método obtiene el origen de datos desde el contenedor del control asociado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A> method gets the data source from the control container, resolved to a specific data member.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A> método obtiene el origen de datos del contenedor del control, que se resuelve como un miembro de datos específico.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetTemplateContainerDataSource%2A> method gets the data source of the template container.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetTemplateContainerDataSource%2A> método obtiene el origen de datos del contenedor de plantillas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method is called when there is a change to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> método se llama cuando se produce un cambio en el control asociado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> method is called when the associated control data source has changed.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> método se llama cuando cambia el origen de datos del control asociado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> method is called when the schema of the associated control data source changes.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> método se llama cuando cambia el esquema del origen de datos del control asociado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A> method is called when an automatic formatting scheme has been applied.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A> método se llama cuando se ha aplicado un esquema de formato automático.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnStylesChanged%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged%2A> methods can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when an associated control style has changed or when the designer template-editing verbs have changed, respectively.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnStylesChanged%2A> y <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged%2A> se pueden invalidar métodos para implementar la funcionalidad que debe ocurrir cuando ha cambiado un estilo del control asociado o cuando han cambiado los verbos de edición de plantillas de diseñador, respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnPropertyBuilder%2A> method handles the property-builder event.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnPropertyBuilder%2A> método controla el evento del generador de propiedades.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner" />.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> class when it creates the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class or a copy of that control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework crea internamente una nueva instancia de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> clase cuando se crea el control asociado que se deriva de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> clase o una copia de ese control en la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer action list collection for this designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la colección de listas de acciones para este diseñador.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> associated with this designer.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection" /> asociado a este diseñador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.ActionLists%2A> property creates an empty <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object and adds the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> that is returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.ActionLists%2A> base property to this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.ActionLists%2A> propiedad crea vacío <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> objeto y agrega el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> devuelto por la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.ActionLists%2A> propiedad a esta base <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Then it adds it to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object, and then returns this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: A continuación, agregarla a la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> objeto y, a continuación, devuelve este <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionListCollection> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the data key field of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el valor del campo de clave de datos del control asociado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField" /> value of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Valor <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField" /> del control asociado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataKeyField%2A> property provides access from the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A> property of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataKeyField%2A> propiedad proporciona acceso desde el diseñador para el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A> propiedad del control asociado que se deriva de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> clase.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A> indicates the primary key of the data source that is bound to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A> indica la clave principal del origen de datos que está enlazado al control asociado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the data member field of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el valor del campo de miembro de datos del control asociado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember" /> value of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Valor <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember" /> del control asociado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> property provides access from the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> property of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> propiedad proporciona acceso desde el diseñador para el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> propiedad del control asociado que se deriva de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> clase.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> indicates the table or element of the data source that is bound to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> indica la tabla o el elemento del origen de datos que está enlazado al control asociado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the data source property of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece el valor de la propiedad del origen de datos del control asociado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource" /> value of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Valor <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource" /> del control asociado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A> property provides access from the designer to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> property of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A> propiedad proporciona acceso desde el diseñador para el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> propiedad del control asociado que se deriva de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> clase.

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer of the data source, when one is selected for data binding.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el diseñador del origen de datos, cuando se selecciona uno para el enlace de datos.

trans-unit.source: The designer for the data source of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Diseñador del origen de datos del control asociado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceDesigner%2A> property returns the designer for the data source of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceDesigner%2A> propiedad devuelve el diseñador para el origen de datos del control asociado que se deriva de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> clase.

trans-unit.source: The designer object implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interface.
trans-unit.target: El objeto del diseñador implementa el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceDesigner> interfaz.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the designer's version of the data source ID property and is used to shadow the corresponding property of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece la versión del diseñador de la propiedad de id. del origen de datos, y se utiliza para realizar una copia sombra de la propiedad correspondiente del control asociado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that is the data source ID of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" /> que es el id. del origen de datos del control asociado.

trans-unit.source: Setting the designer's <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> property causes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the associated control to be set.
trans-unit.target: Establecer el diseñador <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> propiedad causa el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propiedad del control asociado a establecerse.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> is set to a <xref:System.String>, indicating a new data source is to be defined, a **Create Data Source** dialog box is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> está establecido en un <xref:System.String>, que indica un origen de datos es que se defina un **crear origen de datos** se muestra el cuadro de diálogo.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> is set to a <xref:System.String> indicating there is no data source, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> is set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSourceID%2A> está establecido en un <xref:System.String> indicando que no hay ningún origen de datos, el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> se establece en una cadena vacía ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets the default view of the data source that is bound to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene la vista predeterminada del origen de datos enlazado al control asociado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView" /> representing the default view of the data source.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerDataSourceView" /> que representa la vista predeterminada del origen de datos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DesignerView%2A> property gets the default view of the data source that is bound to the associated control by passing the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> property to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> object.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DesignerView%2A> propiedad obtiene la vista predeterminada del origen de datos que está enlazado al control asociado pasando la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> propiedad a la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetView%2A> método de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> objeto.

trans-unit.source: If no view is returned or the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> property is not set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> is used to get the view names and the first view name is used to get the default view.
trans-unit.target: Si no se devuelve ninguna vista o la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> propiedad no está establecida, el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.GetViewNames%2A> método de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner> se utiliza para obtener la vista de nombres y el primer nombre de vista se utiliza para obtener la vista predeterminada.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> para liberar tanto recursos administrados como no administrados; es <see langword="false" /> para liberar únicamente recursos no administrados.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the designer and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera los recursos no administrados utilizados por el diseñador y, de forma opcional, libera los recursos administrados.

trans-unit.source: If the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class has a <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> property that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> interface, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Dispose%2A> method disconnects the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.LoadComplete> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> object.
trans-unit.target: Si el control asociado que se deriva de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> clase tiene un <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> propiedad que implementa el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost> interfaz, el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Dispose%2A> método desconecta el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost.LoadComplete> eventos de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebFormsRootDesigner> objeto.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> method, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Dispose%2A> disconnects the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved> events.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> implementa la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> método, el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Dispose%2A> desconecta el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>, y <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Dispose%2A> also disconnects the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed> events of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> object.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Dispose%2A> también desconecta el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.DataSourceChanged> y <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataSourceDesigner.SchemaRefreshed> eventos de la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> objeto.

trans-unit.source: It finally calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Dispose%2A> base method.
trans-unit.target: Finalmente, se llama el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Dispose%2A> base método.

trans-unit.source: Generates an object that can be used as a data source at design time.
trans-unit.target: Genera un objeto que se puede utilizar como origen de datos en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of rows of sample data that the data source should contain.
trans-unit.target: Número mínimo de filas de datos de muestra que debe contener el origen de datos.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the returned data source contains dummy data; <see langword="false" /> if the returned data source contains data from an actual data source.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si el origen de datos devuelto contiene datos ficticios; es <see langword="false" /> si el origen de datos devuelto contiene datos de un origen de datos real.

trans-unit.source: Generates an object that can be used as a data source at design time.
trans-unit.target: Genera un objeto que se puede utilizar como origen de datos en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> interface that serves as a data source for use at design time.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que implementa una interfaz <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> que actúa como origen de datos para su uso en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method attempts to construct a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object from the data source that is defined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método intenta construir una <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objeto desde el origen de datos definido por el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A> y <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataMember%2A> propiedades.

trans-unit.source: If this is not possible, it creates a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> from dummy data.
trans-unit.target: Si esto no es posible, se crea un <xref:System.Data.DataTable> de datos ficticios.

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> that is used as a template for the data format.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que implementa <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" />, que se utiliza como plantilla para el formato de datos.

trans-unit.source: The minimum number of rows of sample data that the data source data should contain.
trans-unit.target: Número mínimo de filas de datos de muestra que deben contener los datos del origen de datos.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the returned data source contains dummy data; <see langword="false" /> if the returned data source contains data from an actual data source.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si el origen de datos devuelto contiene datos ficticios; es <see langword="false" /> si el origen de datos devuelto contiene datos de un origen de datos real.

trans-unit.source: Generates an object that can be used as a data source at design time.
trans-unit.target: Genera un objeto que se puede utilizar como origen de datos en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> interface that serves as a data source for use at design time.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que implementa una interfaz <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> que actúa como origen de datos para su uso en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method attempts to construct a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> object from the data source that is specified by the `selectedDataSource` parameter.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetDesignTimeDataSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método intenta construir una <xref:System.Data.DataTable> objeto desde el origen de datos especificado por el `selectedDataSource` parámetro.

trans-unit.source: If this is not possible, it creates a <xref:System.Data.DataTable> from dummy data.
trans-unit.target: Si esto no es posible, se crea un <xref:System.Data.DataTable> de datos ficticios.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data source component from the associated control container, resolved to a specific data member.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el componente de origen de datos desde el contenedor de control asociado, resuelto en un miembro de datos concreto.

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> interface containing the design-time <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource" /> of the associated control, resolved to the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember" /> parameter; otherwise, <see langword="null" /> if a data source is not found.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que implementa una interfaz <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> que contiene el <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource" /> en tiempo de diseño del control asociado, resuelto en el parámetro <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember" />; de lo contrario, si no se encuentra ningún origen de datos, es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method to construct a data source from the object that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> properties of the associated control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> método usa la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> método para crear un origen de datos desde el objeto especificado por el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> y <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> propiedades del control asociado derivan de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> clase.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data source component from the associated control container.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el componente de origen de datos del contenedor del control asociado.

trans-unit.source: An object implementing an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> interface containing the design-time <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource" /> property of the associated control; otherwise, <see langword="null" /> if a data source is not found.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que implementa una interfaz <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> que contiene la propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource" /> en tiempo de diseño del control asociado; de lo contrario, si no se encuentra ningún origen de datos, es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> method uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to construct a data source from the object that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> property of the associated control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetSelectedDataSource%2A> método usa la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignTimeData.GetSelectedDataSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método para crear un origen de datos desde el objeto especificado por el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> propiedad del control asociado derivado de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> clase.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that specifies the name of the template for which to get the data source.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" /> que especifica el nombre de la plantilla para la que se va a obtener el origen de datos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data source of the template's container.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el origen de datos del contenedor de la plantilla.

trans-unit.source: An object that implements an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> interface containing a design-time <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource" /> property.
trans-unit.target: Objeto que implementa una interfaz <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerable" /> que contiene una propiedad <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource" /> en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetTemplateContainerDataSource%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A> method to construct a data source from the object that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> properties of the associated control derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetTemplateContainerDataSource%2A> llamadas al método el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource%2A> método para crear un origen de datos desde el objeto especificado por el <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A> y <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A> propiedades del control asociado derivan de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> clase.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetTemplateContainerDataSource(System.String)" /> method is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: El <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetTemplateContainerDataSource(System.String)" /> método está obsoleto.

trans-unit.source: Callers should use the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource" /> method instead.
trans-unit.target: Los llamadores deben utilizar el <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.GetResolvedSelectedDataSource" /> método en su lugar.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="templateName" /> parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: El <paramref name="templateName" /> parámetro no se utiliza.

trans-unit.source: A control derived from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList" />, which implements an <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />.
trans-unit.target: Control derivado de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList" />, que implementa <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.IComponent" />.

trans-unit.source: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Prepara el diseñador para poder ver, modificar y diseñar el control asociado.

trans-unit.source: The designer host calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A> method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: El host del diseñador llama el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A> método cuando esté listo para usar el diseñador para representar el control que se deriva de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> clase.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A> method and its base methods configure properties and connect to events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A> (método) y sus métodos base configuran propiedades y conectarse a los eventos que son necesarios para el funcionamiento del diseñador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A> connects to the design-time data source and updates the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A> se conecta al origen de datos de tiempo de diseño y actualiza el marcado en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> property implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> interface, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A> connects the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>, and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved> events.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent.Site%2A> propiedad implementa la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService> interfaz, el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.Initialize%2A> se conecta el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentAdded>, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoving>, y <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentRemoved> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The `component` parameter is the control, derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>, that is associated with this designer, or a copy of that control.
trans-unit.target: El `component` parámetro es el control derivado de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>, que está asociado a este diseñador, o una copia de ese control.

trans-unit.source: The index of the page with which to initialize the component editor.
trans-unit.target: Índice de la página con la que se inicializará el editor de componentes.

trans-unit.source: Invokes a component editor for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Invoca un editor de componentes para el control asociado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.InvokePropertyBuilder%2A> method creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor> or <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor> object, and then invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> method of the component editor.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.InvokePropertyBuilder%2A> método crea un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor> o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor> objeto y, a continuación, se invoca el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> método para el editor de componentes.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que provocó el evento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contiene los datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: Handles the <see langword="AutoFormat" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Controla el evento <see langword="AutoFormat" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormat%2A> method is obsolete and has no functionality.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormat%2A> método está obsoleto y no tiene ninguna funcionalidad.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> object that defines a style.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> que define un estilo.

trans-unit.source: Called when an automatic formatting scheme has been applied to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Se llama cuando se ha aplicado un esquema de formato automático al control asociado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A> method is called when a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> object is applied to the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A> método se llama cuando un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> se aplica el objeto para el control asociado que se deriva de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> clase.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> object defines a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatStyle> object that is applied to the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> objeto define un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatStyle> objeto que se aplica al control.

trans-unit.source: A designer can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A> to inspect properties of the control or to take some other action.
trans-unit.target: Un diseñador puede reemplazar el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnAutoFormatApplied%2A> para inspeccionar las propiedades del control o realizar alguna otra acción.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que es el origen del evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs" /> que contiene los datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: Called when there is a change to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Se llama a este método cuando hay un cambio en el control asociado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method is called when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> event of a control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class executes.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> se llama al método cuando el <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> eventos de un control que se deriva de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> clase se ejecuta.

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is in response to a property change on the control (for example, a **Properties** grid change).
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, esto es en respuesta a un cambio de propiedad en el control (por ejemplo, un **propiedades** cambio de cuadrícula).

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A> object to which the control is bound is changed, the control is redrawn on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.DataSource%2A> se modifica el objeto al que está enlazado el control, se vuelve a dibujarse el control en la superficie de diseño.

trans-unit.source: Called when the data source for the associated control has changed.
trans-unit.target: Se llama cuando ha cambiado el origen de datos del control asociado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> base method connects the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class to the current data source, and if that is different from the data source to which the control was connected, the method updates the design-time markup.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnDataSourceChanged%2A> método base conecta el control asociado que se deriva de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> clase al origen de datos actual, y si es diferente del origen de datos al que se conectó el control, el método actualiza el marcado en tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that is the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" /> que es el origen del evento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> que contiene los datos del evento.

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the property-builder event.
trans-unit.target: Representa el método que controla el evento del generador de propiedades.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnPropertyBuilder%2A> method invokes a component editor for the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnPropertyBuilder%2A> método invoca un editor de componentes para el control asociado que se deriva de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> clase.

trans-unit.source: It creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor> or <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor> object, and then invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> method of the component editor.
trans-unit.target: Crea un <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataGridComponentEditor> o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataListComponentEditor> objeto y, a continuación, se invoca el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> método para el editor de componentes.

trans-unit.source: Called when the schema of the data source for the associated control changes.
trans-unit.target: Se llama cuando cambia el esquema del origen de datos correspondiente al control asociado.

trans-unit.source: Unless the designer is in template-editing mode or a field is being added or edited, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A> method, which in turn calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method to update the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> control to reflect the data source change.
trans-unit.target: A menos que el diseñador está en modo de edición de plantillas o un campo es que se agrega o edita el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnSchemaRefreshed%2A> llamadas al método el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InvokeTransactedChange%2A> método, que a su vez llama a la <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> método para actualizar la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> control para reflejar el cambio del origen de datos.

trans-unit.source: Can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when a style of the associated control has changed.
trans-unit.target: Se puede reemplazar para implementar funcionalidad que es necesaria cuando ha cambiado un estilo del control asociado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnStylesChanged%2A> method can serve as notification that a style of the associated control that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class has changed.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnStylesChanged%2A> método puede actuar como notificación de que un estilo del asociado de control que se deriva de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> la clase ha cambiado.

trans-unit.source: Can be overridden to implement functionality that should occur when the designer template-editing verbs have changed.
trans-unit.target: Se puede reemplazar para implementar funcionalidad que es necesaria cuando han cambiado los verbos de edición de plantillas del diseñador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged%2A> method can be implemented to perform additional processing, such recording that a change has occurred, when the template-editing verbs change.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged%2A> se puede implementar el método para realizar un procesamiento adicional, como registrar que se ha producido un cambio, cuando cambian los verbos de edición de plantillas.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged" /> method is abstract and must be overridden when a derived class inherits from the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner" /> class.
trans-unit.target: El <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.OnTemplateEditingVerbsChanged" /> método es abstracto y debe reemplazarse cuando una clase derivada hereda de la <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner" /> clase.

trans-unit.source: A collection implementing an <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> interface of the added and shadowed properties.
trans-unit.target: Colección que implementa una interfaz <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> de las propiedades agregadas y propiedades reemplazadas.

trans-unit.source: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add additional properties to the display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: La usa el diseñador para quitar o agregar propiedades en la presentación de la cuadrícula **Propiedades**, o para reemplazar propiedades del control asociado.

trans-unit.source: Control designers use methods that are derived from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the **Properties** grid.
trans-unit.target: Diseñadores de controles utilizan métodos que se derivan de la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> método sombrear las diversas propiedades de control con propiedades en tiempo de diseño correspondientes que el diseñador implementa, y para quitar propiedades o agregar propiedades a la **propiedades** cuadrícula.

trans-unit.source: For controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> creates design-time properties to shadow the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Para los controles que se derivan de la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> (clase), el <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.PreFilterProperties%2A> crea propiedades en tiempo de diseño a sombra la <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSource%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataMember%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataKeyField%2A>, y <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList.DataSourceID%2A> propiedades.

trans-unit.source: Override the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.PreFilterProperties(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method to add properties to or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection.
trans-unit.target: Invalidar el <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner.PreFilterProperties(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> método para agregar propiedades o cambiar atributos de propiedades en la colección de propiedades de tiempo de diseño.

trans-unit.source: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.
trans-unit.target: Asegúrese de llamar al método base antes de realizar otro procesamiento.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.CanRefreshSchema" />.
trans-unit.target: Para una descripción de este miembro, vea <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.CanRefreshSchema" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the schema can be refreshed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Es <see langword="true" /> si se puede actualizar el esquema; de lo contrario, es <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este miembro es una implementación explícita de un miembro de interfaz.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Solo se puede utilizar cuando la instancia de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> se convierte en una interfaz <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider>.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to disable data-binding events until after the schema has been refreshed; <see langword="false" /> to enable the events.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> para deshabilitar los eventos de enlace de datos hasta después de que se haya actualizado el esquema; <see langword="false" /> para habilitar los eventos.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)" />.
trans-unit.target: Para una descripción de este miembro, vea <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.RefreshSchema(System.Boolean)" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este miembro es una implementación explícita de un miembro de interfaz.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Solo se puede utilizar cuando la instancia de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> se convierte en una interfaz <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider>.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.Schema" />.
trans-unit.target: Para una descripción de este miembro, vea <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider.Schema" />.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Un objeto <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataSourceViewSchema" />.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este miembro es una implementación explícita de un miembro de interfaz.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Solo se puede utilizar cuando la instancia de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> se convierte en una interfaz <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IDataBindingSchemaProvider>.
